headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for the Daikin Airbase WiFi module

name.description: Plugin name as displayed in the homebridge log.

hostname.title: Host Name
hostname.description: Forces the hostname of the controller, e.g. 192.168.1.10. If not set, the plugin will scan the network to find Airbase devices automatically.

pollingInterval.title: Polling Interval
pollingInterval.description: The polling interval for refreshing the platform's accessories state for automations, in minutes. By detault set to 5 minutes, it can be set to 0 to disable polling.
